build: -> -> -> ->

details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Strike - Reinforce and Extra Strike
  • Peck - Reinforce
  • Sneak Attack - Reinforce and Extra Strike

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Lynn Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability

extraContent.title: Focus Skills & Spirit Guide Skills
extraContent.content:
While Lynn is in a party, they can select a party member as a 'Focal Target' which skills labelled as [Focus] will affect. If Lynn is not in a party or is in a party by themselves, they will be the Focal Target. Using the Beginner Skill [Focus], Lynn can choose who the Focal Target is

Below is a list of all Focus Skills:

  • [Focus] Heal - 1st Job
  • [Focus] Support Flight - 3rd Job
  • [Focus] Forest Protection - Hyper Skill
  • [Focus] Awaken - 5th Job

Focal Target cannot be yourself for [Focus] Support Flight & Awaken

Lynn's attacks can be categorized by their Spirit Guides, Pan, Penni, and Paeon. Each Spirit Guide provides a stacking %Final Damage (additively) buff whenever their attacks successfully hit an enemy

Below is a list of all Pan attacks:

  • Strike - 1st Job
  • Earth Pulverization - 3rd Job
  • Roar - 4th Job

Below is a list of all Penni attacks:

  • Peck - 2nd Job
  • Sweep - 2nd Job
  • Whirlwind - 4th Job

Below is a list of all Penni attacks:

  • Sneak Attack - 3rd Job
  • Predator's Blow - 4th Job
  • Raid - Hyper Skill
  • Beast's Rage - 5th Job

primary.name: Forest Kiss
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Move back to the Forest Spring.\nCooldown: 600 sec.
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Lynn storyline

primary.name: [Focus]
primary.shortDesc: Each use of Focus cycles the Focal Target to the next party member.\nHolding the Down key while using Focus will cycle the Focal Target to the previous party member instead.\nWhen not in a party, you are always the Focal Target
primary.desc: Selects a Focal Target which Focus Skills will affect
details: [Skill Key]: Selects the next party member as the Focal Target
[Down Arrow Key + Skill Key]: Selects the previous party member as the Focal Target
When not in a party, you are the Focal Target

primary.name: Accompany
primary.shortDesc: Hides the appearance of the current Spirit Guides following Lynn.\nCooldown: 10 sec.

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Lynn storyline
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 85%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Pan swings forward

primary.name: [Focus] Heal
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, the current Focal Target recovers 20% of Max HP every second.\nDuration: 40 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Provides a periodic healing buff to the Focal Target

primary.name: Light Steps
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Forest Power I
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +20%, INT: +10, Magic ATT: +5\n85% of damage taken drains MP instead of HP.
primary.desc: A portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP (excluding %Max HP damage)
details: Additionally, increases %Weapon Mastery and grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: Spirit Guide Unity: Pan
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +100, Ignore Defense: +10%\nDamage Taken: -15%\nUpon using a Pan skill on an enemy - Final Damage: +5%, Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 30 sec
primary.desc: Successful attacks using Pan skills grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (max 3 stacks, additively)
details: Additionally, grants flat Defense, increases %Ignore Defense, and reduces damage taken (excluding %Max HP damage)

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 5
details: This version replaces the 1st Job version
Increases Max Enemies Hit, %Damage, and Number of Attacks

primary.name: Sweep
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 60%, Number of Attacks: 3, moves in the designated direction.\nExpends 1 charge upon use, gain 1 charge every 5.0 sec, Max Charges: 5
primary.desc: Dashes forward damaging enemies in your path
details: Pressing the Up or Down Arrow Keys and Skill Key together will dash diagonally in the given direction
Skill is prepared every 5 sec (up to 5 charges)

primary.name: Peck
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Penni automatically attacks enemies - Damage: 270%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: While toggled, Penni seeks and attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Light Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7. Allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Vertical jump skill
details: Can be assigned to a Key Slot or activated while on the ground by pressing the Up Key and Jump Key together

primary.name: Forest Power II
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +50%, INT: +20, Magic ATT: +10
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: Spirit Guide Unity: Penni
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Speed: +20, Max Speed: +15, Jump: +20\nUpon using a Penni skill on an enemy - Final Damage: +5%, Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Successful attacks using Penni skills grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (max 3 stacks, additively)
details: Additionally, increases %Crit Rate and grants flat Speed, Max Speed, and Jump

primary.name: Forest Wind
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, INT: +10, MP: +120 per level, Max MP: +20%\nPassive Effects: Upon using a magic attack - 24% chance to absorb 8% of Max MP\nAbsorb 5% of Max MP from bosses
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Additionally, increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages), %Max MP, and grants flat INT and MP per character level
Effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 5
details: This version replaces the 2nd Job version
Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Earth Pulverization
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Max enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 12
After attacking, a burning fissure is created at the attack location for 30 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 10%, Number of Attacks: 5, Duration: every 1 sec
Cooldown: 30 sec
Burning Fissure - Normal Monster Damage: +1250%
primary.desc: Pan smashes the ground creating a lingering Burning Fissure that damages enemies within it
details: Burning Fissure deals increased damage to regular monsters
Burning Fissure is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Peck
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Automatically overwritten when a better version is learned via Job Advancement. Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 5\nCan be toggled On/Off
details: This version replaces the 2nd Job version
Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks

primary.name: [Focus] Support Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Cooldown: 20 sec\nInstantly moves you to the current Focal Target's location or vice versa.\nCannot use if the Focal Target is too far away
details: [Skill Key]: Teleport to Focal Target
[Down Arrow Key + Skill Key]: Teleport the Focal Target to your location
Focal Target cannot be yourself
Cannot be used if Focal Target is too far away

primary.name: Sneak Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 140. Upon skill use, Paeon prepares to attack. Then, if another Spirit Guide skill damages an enemy, Paeon will attack the same enemy.\nMax Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 680%, Number of Follow-up Attacks: 8\nCooldown: 2 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, upon successful Pan or Penni attacks, Paeon deals an additional attack to the same target
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Purify
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60. Purifies nearby allies for 20 sec.\nPurified allies lose 1 harmful effect every 2 sec, up to 5 total effects.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Casts a buff that periodically cures affected party members of Abnormal Statuses (up to 5 statuses)

primary.name: Nature's Providence
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Duration: 90 sec. All party members - Ignore Defense: +30%

primary.name: Forest Power III
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +60%, INT: +20, Magic Attack: +10
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: Spirit Guide Unity: Paeon
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +50%, Critical Damage: +30%, Boss Damage: +35%, Attack Speed: +1\nUpon using a Paeon skill on an enemy - Final Damage: +5%, Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 30 sec
primary.desc: Successful attacks using Paeon skills grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (max 3 stacks, additively)
details: Additionally, increases %Crit Rate, %Crit Damage, %Boss Damage, and Attack Speed (by 1 stage)

primary.name: Vitality Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Status Resistance: +16, Elemental Resistance: +16%, Defense: +320, Knockback Resistance: +50%

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 315%, Number of Attacks: 6
details: This version replaces the 3rd Job version
Increases Max Enemies Hit, %Damage, and Number of Attacks

primary.name: Roar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 520%, Number of Attacks: 10, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Pan roars damaging nearby enemies

primary.name: Peck
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 450, Penni automatically attacks enemies - Damage: 660%, Number of attacks: 6
details: This version replaces the 3rd Job version
Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks

primary.name: Whirlwind
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60. You move back, and deal 580% damage to up to 12 enemies in front of you 4 times. Holding the skill allows you to float for up to 3 sec\nCooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Teleports you backwards and releases a gust of wind forward damaging enemies
details: Holding down the Skill Key will cause you to float briefly

primary.name: Support Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300. Teleports all party members on the current map to your location\nCooldown: 30 sec

primary.name: Predator's Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1050%, Number of Attacks: 7.\nEnemies hit take 10% additional damage for 40 sec\nCooldown: 40 sec
primary.desc: Paeon pounces at nearby targets dealing damage and applying a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Damage
Can only be used when enemies are nearby
Prioritizes enemies with the highest Max HP

primary.name: Mother Nature's Touch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200. Affects all party members on the same map - Removes all harmful effects, immediately restores 100% of Max HP, heals 10% HP every second for 30 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Upon casting, cures all party members of Abnormal Statuses and restores %Max HP
details: After casting, grants party members a buff that periodically restores %Max HP

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec.

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs

primary.name: Forest Power IV
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +70%, INT: +30, Magic ATT: +30
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: [Focus] Heal Boost
primary.shortDesc: Focal Target - Increased healing: +10%, Attack Power: +10, Magic ATT: +10
details: Increases amount healed
Now grants affected Focal Target flat Attack and Magic Attack

primary.name: Nature's Providence Boost
primary.shortDesc: Nature's Providence - Item Drop Rate +10%
details: Now additionally increases %Item Drop Rate

primary.name: Guardian's Signet
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +50%

primary.name: Commune
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Magic ATT by 50, Buff duration by 50%, Knockback Resistance by 50%, and Damage by 30%

hyperActive.name: [Focus] Forest Protection
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 600. Creates a protective zone at the location of the current Focal Target for 40 sec, grants a Damage Reduction and Fatal Damage Negation buff to all party members within the protective zone
Damage Reduction: Reduces damage taken by 30% (including percentage HP attacks)
Fatal Damage Negation: Protects from one KO
Party members that receive Fatal Damage Negation cannot receive it again for 300 sec.
Cooldown: 300 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a protective barrier at the location of the Focal Target where party members inside it gain a buff
details:
[Buff]: Reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks and protects allies from one KO
  • After the Fatal Damage Negation buff, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time

hyperActive.name: Raid
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1780%, Number of Attacks: 12\nCooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Paeon dashes forward leaving behind a trail of slashes

hyperActive.name: Aura of Destiny
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Lynn characters in the party.

fifthMain.name: Beast's Rage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000. Summons Paeon in front of you. Paeon Activations: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 12, Duration: 8 sec, Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons Paeon creating a large damaging field of slashing attacks
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Beak Strike
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 400, Duration: 40 sec, Enhances Peck. Max enemies Hit: 12, Enhanced Damage: 660%, Number of Attacks: 6, Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, enhances resulting in a stronger attack that damages nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: [Focus] Awaken
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1150, Duration: 30 sec, Final Damage: +27% for self
Grants a +10% Final Damage buff to the current Focal Target (cannot be yourself), which scales based on your INT stat
Upon skill use, all party members gain Exhaust 30 sec
Focal Target: Final Damage increases by 1% per 1000 INT, up to 95%
Exhaust: Prevents the use of Awaken if you or the Focal Target have the exhaust effect
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, increases %Final Damage for self, grants a buff to Focal Target, and 'Exhaust' to all party members
details:
[Focal Target Buff]: Increases %Final Damage
  • Focal Target buff scales off of your INT stat: +1% for every 1000 INT (up to 95%, additively)
  • Focal Target cannot be yourself
[Exhaust]: Cannot receive the effects of Awaken again for a set time

Does not stack with Bishop's Benediction
  • Awaken's effects are always prioritized

fifthMain.name: Nature's Grace
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500. Immediately restores 95% of Max HP to all party members, grants you the [Excess Healing] effect for 30 sec
[Excess Healing]: Your healing can now restore up to 190% of Max HP instead of the usual 100%, helaing that exceeds the usual 100% amount becomes a shield
The shield disappears when the [Excess Healing] effect ends
Cooldown: 185 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, restores %Max HP and grants all party members the buff 'Excess Healing'
details: [Excess Healing]: Healing from caster that exceeds Max HP becomes a shield

masteryCore.name: HEXA Strike
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 485%, Number of Attacks: 6

originSkill.name: Source Flow
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1500, Invincible during casting\nMax Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1080%, Number of Attacks: 12, Spirit Guide Activations: 54\nCooldown: 360 sec

meta: Lynn is an INT mage class part of its own class group, Forest Child. Lynn utilize Memorial Staff as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Lynn can equip Leaves and Shields
